data.title: The University of Utah
data.meta_description: My research and creative work is is expressed and realized in various ways: 1.Conducting and Musical Direction of 25-30 concerts per year, at the U of U, national and internationally. 2. Performances on viola and viola d’amore 3. Published writing and blog entries about the nature of creativity, performance and interpretation. These activities continue to perpetuate new collaborations and opportunities that have taken, and will take my work to other concert halls, universities, and countries.

Honors & Awards

Poetry manuscript was chosen as the winner of the 30 Poems in 30 Days National Poetry Month Annual Writing Competition. Chapbook of winning poems to be published by the Community Writing Center in 2022. SLCC Community Writing Center, 05/15/2021

Awarded Honorary Adjunct Professorship. Wuhan University, Wuhan China, 01/02/2019

Served as the conductor and on the production team for the 25th anniversary of "It's a Grand Night for Singing," an annual stage production by the UK Opera Theatre. This production won the 2018 Ohio Valley Chapter Regional Emmy Award for best live performance production. While the Emmy officially went to KET Television, the entire production team shares in the award . Emmy Award Winning Production, Ohio Valley Chapter , 07/27/2018

Career Services Faculty Recognition Award. University of Utah Career Services, 04/07/2017

Before the Downbeat, Blog on music and creativity, was chosen 3 times as a spotlight entry for the feature Freshly Pressed. It was also featured on the U's Red Thread blog, the College of Fine Arts blog, and by the College Orchestra Directors Association. http://beforethedownbeat.wordpress.com/. WordPress, 03/2013

2008 Faculty Excellence Award, University of Utah College of Fine Arts . College of Fine Arts, 05/2008

2007 Higher Education Teacher of the Year. American String Teachers Association, Utah Chapter. American String Teachers' Association--Utah Chapter, 02/2007

KETKY: December 25, 2018 at 8:00 PM ET Robert Baldwin conducts the 25th anniversary of this annual concert by the UK Opera Theatre in this 2018 Ohio Valley Chapter Regional Emmy Award-nominated production. The jubilant musical staged in Lexington at the Singletary Center for the Arts contains many favorite numbers from past productions, including "Show People," "Lullaby of Broadway," as well as more recent hits, including songs from the hit Broadway musical Hamilton. Additional Airdates: KETKY: November 26, 2018 at 2:00 AM ET KETKY: November 20, 2018 at 9:00 PM ET KETKY: November 14, 2018 at 3:00 PM ET. 12/25/2018. https://www.ket.org/episode/KGRNS%20000000/

Utah Philharmonia listed as one of the top performances of 2011 by reviewer Ed Reichel in Reichel Recommends: "Utah Philharmonia – Native American flutist R. Carlos Nakai joined the Philharmonia and conductor Robert Baldwin for a mesmerizing performance of James DeMars’ Two World Concerto. The work deftly combines Western classical music traditions with Native American idioms in a compelling and fascinating work. And Nakai brought a sense of spirituality to his soulful playing. This was a deeply moving and heartfelt performance.". 12/27/2011. http://www.reichelrecommends.com/?p=1977
